column4: guys anyone got this thumbnails problem or it's just me here using torrent exclusively??
i use torrents too, however i never encountered the problem as i don't use thumbnails
so u suggest to get rid of the problem by bitting off one of my legs or something? =)
id simply disable thumbnails for that folder temporarily
unless thumbnails are essential to you
and how do i disable tn just for one folder??
this too uses thumbnails, just tiny ones =)
it doesn't even have the right settings, all my files are way above 5Mb default settings... still gets thumbed =)
even if u set it to files larger than 1gb ?
well you can set to show thumbnails: never
it says 'smaller than' right next to it.. you imply it means 'more than' insteand? =)
i set mine to never show thumbnails and are not being shown
might be a wise choice after all =)
it's really a work around more than a fix however i dont think thumbnails are that vital
